Healthcare Working Group

The Healthcare Working Group will house and foster technical and business-level conversations about appropriate applications for blockchain technology in the healthcare industry.

Meetings

We meet monthly:

Tuesday, August 22 RecordingSlides

Tuesday, September 19th

Tuesday, October 17th

Charter and FAQ

The Charter defines the scope and ways that work together. Some brief FAQs help answer questions as the WG gets started.

Communication Tools

  • healthcare-wg mailing list
  • #healthcare-wg Rocket.Chat channel

Preliminary Survey

The WG ran a preliminary survey showing areas that participants are interested in working with blockchains to improve healthcare operations.
